original_text: They were allowed to torment them for five months, but not to kill them, and their torment was like the torment of a scorpion when it stings someone.
korean_text: 그러나 그들을 죽이지는 못하게 하시고 다섯 달 동안 괴롭게만 하게 하시는데 그 괴롭게 함은 전갈이 사람을 쏠 때에 괴롭게 함과 같더라

sentences.original_text: They were allowed to torment them
and their torment was like the torment of a scorpion
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들의 고통은 전갈이 쏘는 고통과 같았으며
